tool.name: Scanpy FindMarkers
tool.description: to find differentially expressed genes between groups
tool.command: ln -s '${input_obj_file}' input.h5 && PYTHONIOENCODING=utf-8 scanpy-find-markers #if $output_markers --save diffexp.tsv #end if --n-genes '${n_genes}' #if $groupby_file #set f = open($groupby_file.__str__) #set groupby = f.read().strip() #silent f.close #else #set groupby = $groupby.replace('INPUT_OBJ', $input_obj_file.__getattr__('name')) #end if --groupby '${groupby}' #if $settings.default == "false" #if $settings.key_added #set key_added = $settings.key_added.replace('GROUPBY', $groupby.__str__) --key-added '${key_added}' #end if --method '${settings.method}' ${settings.rankby_abs} #if $settings.groups --groups '${settings.groups}' #end if --reference '${settings.reference}' #if $settings.filter.default == "false" --filter-params 'min_in_group_fraction:${settings.filter.min_in_group_fraction},max_out_group_fraction:${settings.filter.max_out_group_fraction},min_fold_change:${settings.filter.min_fold_change}' #end if #if $settings.layer --layer '${settings.layer}' --no-raw #else ${settings.use_raw} #end if $settings.pts $settings.tie_correct #end if @INPUT_OPTS@ @OUTPUT_OPTS@

param.name: output_markers
param.label: Output markers table in tsv format

param.name: n_genes
param.label: Number of top genes to show per group/cluster

param.name: groupby_file
param.label: File with groupby. Overrides the groupby setting

param.name: key_added
param.label: The key in adata.uns information is saved to. If included, the keyword 'GROUPBY' will be substituted with the value of the groupby setting.

param.name: method
param.label: Method for testing differentially expressed genes

param.name: use_raw
param.label: Use raw attribute if present. If the layer option is set, this will be ignored (raw will not be used).

param.name: rankby_abs
param.label: Rank by absolute value of the scores instead of the scores

param.name: groups
param.label: Subset of groups/clusters to which comparisons shell be restricted. Currently it fails if a single group is given, provide at least two.

param.name: reference
param.label: If 'rest', compare to the union of the rest of the group/cluster. If a group identifier, compare to that group

param.name: min_in_group_fraction
param.label: Minimum in-group fraction
param.help: Post-test filtering to only keep genes expressed in at least this fraction of cells in the test group.

param.name: max_out_group_fraction
param.label: Maximum out-group fraction
param.help: Post-test filtering to only keep genes expressed in at most this fraction of cells in the reference group.

param.name: min_fold_change
param.label: Minimum fold change
param.help: Post-test filtering to only keep genes with at least this fold change of expression relative to the reference group.

param.name: layer
param.label: Layer to use marker genes, leave empty of .X . It will override the use of raw if set.

param.name: pts
param.label: Compute the fraction of cells expressing the genes?

param.name: tie_correct
param.label: Use tie correction for 'wilcoxon' scores. Used only for 'wilcoxon'.
